website_summaries.verdict: Understated elegance. Brushed metal bracelet and the iconic Cartier Tank look.
pros: Sporty design on a classic timepiece

customer_reviews.title: one complaint
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is tht I found the same product on JOMASHOP at $3,695 dlls. beside that I am satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Valdes

customer_reviews.title: big mistake
customer_reviews.text: It was a big mistake to buy a Cartier watch through Amazon.com. The watch stopped working less than a month after I received it. I took it to Cartier to see if the problem was a dead battery. It was not the battery; the battery was fine, it was the watch itself. It cost over 400 dollars for repairs.
customer_reviews.author: D. LEE

customer_reviews.title: Query Cartier watch authenticity from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the watch directly from Amazon. The watch seems great and seems real; however I took it to Cartier and they told me they wanted to see the certificate of authenticity, stamped by the seller. The watch came without any certificate, and seemingly without any warranty. I am very troubled.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. It stopped working after 2 years with no reason and it costs 1,000 to send for repair.
customer_reviews.author: Cenk Kamis

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, great buy, best price in the world
customer_reviews.text: This watch is absolutely beautiful and exactly new as advertised. I was recently in Paris and this same piece was $3k more at their flagship store. WatchMaxx communicated w me directly to assist in coordinating shipping to insure my ability to receive. They were professional and expedient. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE ON A CLASSIC WATCH
customer_reviews.text: was a bit worried about purchasing this watch on amazon, but the price couldnt be beat (over 20% less than at cartier) and amazon is much more reputable than other online hack shops...the watch arrived next day in perfect brand new condition...had my jewler certify and everything is great. Glad I bought it here and saved the cash. BTW, I bought from AMAZON LLC, not one of the other amazon merchants as AMAZON will give you the 2 year guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: We both love it. It is really beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a birthday gift for my wife. We both love it. It is really beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Jackywang

customer_reviews.title: Major support issues if something goes wrong
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch - but do NOT buy from Amazon. Bought this watch as a wedding gift for my wife and stopped working after ~8 months. It took 6 weeks to get back from Swinford Jewelers (Amazon's partner for warranty) and we thought everything was fine. then ~2 months later it stopped working again. Now Amazon wants me to ship it back again and wait another 6 weeks to get the watch back. This will be a repeatable process and Amazon will not accept that an item is a lemon and just replace it Poor customer service from the house that Bezos built. Stick to cheap items through this channel
customer_reviews.author: pjbeans

customer_reviews.title: cartier midsize
customer_reviews.text: i was really happy with my purchase from amazon. i saved approximately $1k off sticker price of this watch and then didn't have to pay tax and/or shipping. i love this classic design and am so glad i was able to get it at a great price and not have to worry about it being real. i took it to my local jeweler and told him where i got it-and said if it came from amazon itself, no worries.
customer_reviews.author: A. Braudis

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT TIMEPIECE
customer_reviews.text: This watch has gotten me HUNDREDS of comments; it keeps great time and even after 2 years is not scratched at all!!! Overall a BEAUTIFUL piece of craftsmanship
customer_reviews.author: S. Hurray

customer_reviews.title: Cartier francais
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Truly a beautiful classic yet modern piece. Brought to my jeweler to authenticate. It's a real Cartier and arrived within three days. Way to go Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Mila Jane Deloren

customer_reviews.title: NICE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review just to hope my husband would read it before my birthday. *Wicked* He shall know what to do. This is my dream piece and I would love to wear it every single day.
customer_reviews.author: J Clearwater

product_meta.title: Cartier Midsize W51011Q3 Tank Francaise Stainless Steel Watch
product_meta.description:
White Grained dial enhanced by blue steel hands. Silver-tone stainless steel case with a silver-tone stainless steel band. Quartz movement. 30 meters / 100 feet water resistance. Fixed bezel. Scratch Resistant Sapphire crystal. Stainless Steel caseback. Hidden Deployment clasp. Octagonal crown. Case size 31 mm x 25 mm x 6 mm. Band 15 mm x long. Cartier W51011Q3 Tank Francaise Watch.

feature_bullets: Watch in brushed stainless steel featuring square dial with Roman numeral markers, blue sword-shape hands, and date window
25 mm stainless steel case with scratch-resistant-sapphire dial window
Swiss quartz movement with analog display
Stainless steel link bracelet with deployment clasp
Water resistant to 30 m (99 ft): In general, withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming
